Hi, I'm so glad you're chatting with me!

TEACH *UNNI.*: If you are trying to teach me, you need to click this button. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
^.*(LOVE|LUV) (YOU|U).*: Awh, shucks! I love you too!
HELP.*: I'll try, but I'm still learning myself.
NO.*: Ok. Got that.  If you would you like to teach me, click Teach UnniBot below, else just say something else? %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
NOT INTERESTED.*: Fair enough. Would you like to teach me something? Click this button. %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
SOMETHING ELSE: Ok. What else would you like to talk about?  I may or may not understand it, but I'll try.
^.*BYE.*: Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Goodbye!
